misc: Known for bomb drives despite his advanced age.
biography: Harri, a member of Hattula Golf, is one of the most compelling stories on the Hector Trophée circuit.  Known to his fans as "the doctor," Harri consistently defies expectations with his prodigious length off the tee, a testament to his dedication and skill. Even in the later stages of his career, Harri continues to amaze crowds with his powerful drives.

His record speaks for itself.  A two-time Hector Trophée champion, having secured the coveted title in 2024 and in the sixth edition of the tournament, Harri's performances are marked by consistency and a remarkable ability to perform under pressure. He has also graced the Hector Trophée field in 2025, 2023, and 2022, demonstrating a long-standing commitment to the event and a steady presence among the tournament's elite.

While the Victor trophy remains elusive, Harri's contributions to the Hector Trophée are undeniable. He is a true competitor, a player who embodies the spirit of the game and always brings an exciting brand of golf to the course.  His presence alone is enough to make this tournament special, and his future appearances are highly anticipated by fans and fellow players alike.
